reviews.review_msg: She's an amazing prof.  She is the reason I decided to take Italian over Spanish.  She moves quickly but that is because there is too much to cover in the book. She always refers back to previous chapters and won't get mad if you make simple mistakes.
Took ITAL 100 and 101. Both were great.
She is the best prof i've had throught my university career. She's super helpful and really wants everyone to do well, i would definately recommend her.
She's super nice but she moves along so quickly and quizzes included material and vocab we never covered!
